Tables

Table markup

            

                
                

                    ...
                    ...
                

                
                
                

                    ...
                    ...
# Name Color Size
1 Orange Orange 2kg
2 Apple Red 3kg
3 Grape urple 4kg
4 Orange Orange 2kg
5 Apple Red 3kg

Table bordered

For showing borders around the entire table, add border class beside the table class.

            <table class="table border">
                ...
            </table>
# Name Color Size
1 Orange Orange 2kg
2 Apple Red 3kg
3 Grape urple 4kg

Row bordered

For showing row borders, add border-row class beside the table class.

            <table class="table border-row">
                ...
            </table>
# Name Color Size
1 Orange Orange 2kg
2 Apple Red 3kg
3 Grape urple 4kg

Column bordered

For showing column borders, add border-col class beside the table class.

            <table class="table border-col">
                ...
            </table>
# Name Color Size
1 Orange Orange 2kg
2 Apple Red 3kg
3 Grape urple 4kg

Header row bordered

For just showing header row borders, add border-header-row class beside the table class.

            <table class="table border-header-row">
                ...
            </table>
# Name Color Size
1 Orange Orange 2kg
2 Apple Red 3kg
3 Grape urple 4kg

Striped rows

Add class stripe-rows for striped affect to alternate rows of the table.

            <table class="table stripe-rows">
                ...
            </table>
# Name Color Size
1 Orange Orange 2kg
2 Apple Red 3kg
3 Grape urple 4kg

Striped columns

Add class stripe-cols for striped affect to alternate columns of the table.

            <table class="table stripe-cols">
                ...
            </table>
# Name Color Size
1 Orange Orange 2kg
2 Apple Red 3kg
3 Grape urple 4kg

Combine them all

Add class border-all for showing border around the entire table, columns and rows of the table.

Add class striped for showing striped affect to alternate columns and rows of the table.

            <table class="table border-all striped">
                ...
            </table>
# Name Color Size
1 Orange Orange 2kg
2 Apple Red 3kg
3 Grape urple 4kg
